text: Just to play devils advocate, I really don’t see any benefit to HubL in module.css or module.js when custom CSS properties (variables) and data-attributes exist; simply pass your HubL vars to the parent element and you’ll get the same effect while also keeping your styles and scripts cleaner (imo) by not mixing languages. That also eliminates your minification worries.
how to prevent archived posts from showing in blog_recent_posts
is there a way to know if a blog post is archived like content.archived
